mapper.select: SELECT json_text FROM strategy WHERE userid = #{0,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND sid = #{1,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.update: UPDATE strategy SET py_text = #{2,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} WHERE userid = #{0,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND sid = #{1,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: SELECT resultid FROM backtesting WHERE userid = #{0,jdbcType=BIGINT} AND sid = #{1,jdbcType=BIGINT} AND start = #{2,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} AND end = #{3,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}
